original_text: And it came to pass, when he was come near to enter into Egypt, that he said unto Sarai his wife, Behold now, I know that thou art a fair woman to look upon:
korean_text: 그가 애굽에 가까이 이르렀을 때에 그의 아내 사래에게 말하되 내가 알기에 그대는 아리따운 여인이라

sentences.original_text: when he was come near to enter into Egypt
that he said unto Sarai his wife
I know that thou art a fair woman to look upon
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네가 보기에 아름다운 여인임을 안다
